body_html:
Idk, maybe the issue can be closed. All attempts to build TensorFlow with GPU support crashed. However, I suspect it was something about Bazel and GCC.

GCC 4 and 5 still miss libmpfr.so and fail, as well as GCC 8, since it is not supported as of now.

...but after updating Bazel and GCC-7 to the most recent version I can compile TensorFlow 1.8 with GPU support now.

...but after updating Bazel and GCC-7 to the most recent version I can compile TensorFlow 1.8 with GPU support now.
body:
Idk, maybe the issue can be closed. All attempts to build TensorFlow with GPU support crashed. However, I suspect it was something about `Bazel` and `GCC`.

GCC 4 and 5 still miss `libmpfr.so` and fail, as well as GCC 8, since it is not supported as of now.

...but after updating `Bazel` and `GCC-7` to the most recent version I can compile TensorFlow 1.8 with GPU support now.
